record.alternateTitle1: Joseph P. Kennedy Jr. Mental Retardation Research Center
record.description: The Lieutenant Joseph P. Kennedy, Jr. Mental Retardation Research Clinic [established] in memory of Joseph P. Kennedy, Jr., July 25 1915-August 12, 1944, and his heroic patriotism. Dedicated August 31, 1966.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Joseph P. Kennedy, Jr. Mental Retardation Research Center is located in the University of Chicago Children's Hospital.
